name: Atlantis Dave
description:
3 builds as per TriJam requirements. Total avout 7 ish hours.

Theme: Deep Waters as in deep under the sea, as in Atlantis :)

You play as our hero Dave the Plumber. Fixing leaks in the underwater city of Atlantis. But be quick the more leaks the quicker the cities fill. Use the portals to travel to the coloured underwater cities. Avoid falling in the water. 

Arrow keys to move. Space to jump. Touch the leaks to repair.

Tips: The gates are set up for the efficient travel, learn the patterns and you'll get a higher score.
